title: Antonio Brown Tells Raiders to Release Him After Guaranteed Money Voided
text:
Christian Petersen/Getty Images

Antonio Brown continues to be frustrated with the Oakland Raiders, with the disgruntled receiver now asking for his release:

According to ESPN's Adam Schefter, the Raiders fined Brown $215,073.53 for conduct detrimental to the team, which voids the $29.25 million in guaranteed money on his contract, which may explain Brown's request.

This article will be updated to provide more information on this story as it becomes available.
